original_title: Aitken Spence Printing clinches multiple awards
original_body_lines: Aitken Spence Printing won 02 Gold, 05 Silver and 01 Bronze awards at Lanka Star 2023 awards ceremony which was held recently. The 2 Gold, 3 Silver and 1 Bronze awards were received for beverage packaging and the other 02 silver awards for industrial packaging and luxury packaging (one Silver for each category).
The Sri Lanka Packaging Awards’ aim is to recognise excellence and creativity in packaging across various industries.

Submissions for the Sri Lanka Packaging Award 2023 were evaluated on their overall viability, the reason for which they were created, and any unique qualities that would make them deserve of the honor for Sri Lankan packaging. Sri Lanka packaging awards 2023 judging was assessed by eminent panel comprising 05 on site judges and 1 external judge including 2 international judges.
Winners of the Lanka Star awards are eligible to compete at the Asia Star and World Star Competitions.

Aitken Spence Printing won Gold and Bronze awards at the Sri Lanka Print Excellence Awards 2023 that was held recently. The Gold award was received for the category of gift boxes and Bronze Award was received for the category of annual reports.
